game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.beginning: Players take on the role of a Chronicler, tasked with unraveling the mysteries of a mystical realm known as Aethoria.
game.ending: The fate of Aethoria hangs in the balance as the player must make a choice that determines the future of the realm and its inhabitants.
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, fragments of memories and events from different eras collide. Players navigate through a non-linear narrative, piecing together clues to uncover a conspiracy that threatens the very fabric of reality.
